title: [Large-scale] Development Process for an Electronic Performance Support System (EPSS) to Support Language Learning for Novice Instructional Designers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory and language education experience (grammar analysis, text interpretation, vocabulary application)
context.additional_context: Customized EPSS development training for language education practitioners. Centers on system design to enhance learners' reading comprehension, expressive abilities, and communication skills.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze functional requirements of EPSS components (tutorials, examples, resources, tools, wizards) and design optimizations tailored to language learning content (text, vocabulary, grammar).

Learners can develop and implement an EPSS prototype specialized for language education activities (integrated reading, writing, listening, speaking) to enhance the work efficiency of novice instructional designers (NIDs).

Learners can establish an EPSS evaluation system specialized for language education domains (grammatical accuracy, lexical diversity, expressive fluency) and derive improvement plans through formative assessments.

resources: EPSS (Electronic Performance Support System) development template

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
